    System Matrix

    System Matrices

    For loading the system matrix, one could in principle again call measData but there is again a high level function for this job. Since system functions can be very large it is crutial to load only the subset of frequencies that are used during reconstruction The high level system matrix loading function is called getSystemMatrix and has the following interface

    function getSystemMatrix(f::MPIFile,
                         frequencies=1:rxNumFrequencies(f)*rxNumChannels(f);
                         bgCorrection=false,
                         loadasreal=false,
                         kargs...)

    loadasreal can again be used when using a solver requiring real numbers. The most important parameter is frequencies, which defaults to all possible frequencies over all receive channels. In practice one will determine the frequencies using the the Frequency Filter functionality.
